name: ReplaceEntityTranslation
description: Creates an EntityTranslation if one does not exist yet, otherwise it replaces the current one.

properties.name: EntityField
properties.description: The name of the property you are translating, in case of translating the Description of a Discount this would be 'Description'

properties.name: EntityID
properties.description: The Identifier of the object you are translating, in case of a Discount this would be the DiscountID

properties.name: EntityType
properties.description: The name of the object you are translating, in case of a Discount this would be 'Discount'

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The translated value for the property you are translating
